body.p:
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
against } Washington Circuit Court
Thomas Rigdon, Micajah Rigdon and Roderick Hamilton

The Grand Jury of -- -- County in the name, and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky accuse Thomas Rigdon, Micajah Rigdon and Roderick Hamilton of the crime of "Grand Larceny" committed as follows: The said Thomas Rigdon, Micajah Rigdon. Roderick Hamilton on the 1st day of December 1863 in the County aforesaid, did feloniously steal take and curry away from the presence of John Ro^d^gers one Horse beast the property of said Ro^d^gers by force and putting him the said Rodgers in fear of some immediate injury of his person against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky --

Witnesses before the Jury
John Rodgers
E. D. Askins
Barton W. Rodgers
L. H. Noble Attorney for Commonwealth

A Copy Attest
James P. Barbour
